content:
Special treat for anyone who remembers networking before the Web: tonight I called a company customer service line whose recording said -

We have changed our hours due to the Novell coronavirus ...

It's too late now, but this may mean the outgoing POTUS may learn he's been blaming the wrong people...
I guess that'll teach those folks still using NDS!
I moved my entire network to Lantastic six months ago, so I'm safe
Oh no, then maybe it's time to replace my ARCNET adapters and go full token ring
